title: Editor-in-chief
description: Content writing, translation of medical articles, social media page administration, hot line medical consultation, news reporting and interviewing medical persons.

title: General Practitioner/ Primary Care Physician
description: Private clinic providing primary healthcare, minor surgeries, and laboratory services. Collaborated with Population Services International and Myanmar Medical Association for TB and Malaria treatment programs. Founded and led `Heartyfarm` social welfare group organizing charity clinic activities.

title: ICT Consultant
description: Comprehensive learning material creation and development of a Learning Management System (LMS).

title: ICT Manager
description: Led data-driven application development and visualization dashboards. Supervise and manage day-to-day organizational IT tasks and systems.

title: Mobile and Web application development contractor
description: Development and implementation of a comprehensive malaria case reporting system. An offlie-first mobile app and a web based information management system.

title: IT Policy & Cybersecurity Consultant
description: A contractor role in providing cybersecurity training and developing IT policies related to data storage security and record management.

title: IT Specialist
description: A technical specialist role in developing information management systems.
